name: Pet the Fox!
description:
Pet the fox for as long as you feel like - the more you pet him the higher your affection will get! If you stop petting him, however, he'll become sad, and if you let him stay sad for too long you'll hit a game over.

This game is a prototype I made in one night while  taking a break from thesis work. I'm unsure if I'll continue this, and how much I'll add to it if I do happen to come back to it, but I figured it was cute enough as a short prototype to share here for now.
